SIGNIN_TO_ADD_CREDITS: Sign in to enter gift card
SAVE_CARD_FOR_FUTURE_USE: Save this card for future use
PLACING_ORDER_POLICY: By placing order you are agreeing to
REFUND_TO_ACCOUNT_DESC: will be added to your Leflair account as a credit for future purchase.
REFUND_TO_CREDIT_CARD_DESC: will be added to your credit card. The delivery fee is subtracted from the amount. Our customer service will contact you to clarify the details.
RETURN_REQUIREMENTS: Please be sure the returned product meets these requirements:
RETURN_REQUIREMENT_1: Products must be returned together with the return form, Leflair invoice & receipt.
RETURN_REQUIREMENT_2: Products must have no sign of use or repair, full box, full accessories, client manual, stamps and/or warranty cards & gifts (if any).
CONTACT_TO_ARRANGE_PICKUP: Our customer service team will contact you shortly to arrange pick up
ENTER_DISCOUNT: Do you have a discount code?
DISCOUNT_VALUE: Your order will be discounted by {{value}}
DISCOUNT_VALUE_AND_FREE_SHIPPING: Your order will be discounted by {{value}} and free shipping
FREE_PAYMENT: Due amount is zero VND, no payment needed!
ERROR_PLEASE_FILL_ALL: Please fill in all Credit Card information
ERROR_PLEASE_FILL_CVV: Please enter cvv number for selected credit card
CHECKOUT_ERROR: Could not complete the checkout process. Please contact customer service for assistance.
CANNOT_GENERATE_ORDER: Could not generate order. Please contact customer service for assistance.
USER_SPEND_MORE_CREDIT_THAN_THEY_HAVE: There was an error calculating your account credit, please try again.
DEFAULT_CC_ERROR_MESSAGE: Incorrect Credit Card information. Please try again.
BILLING_PHONE_NUMBER_IS_NOT_VALID: Billing phone number is not valid.
SHIPPING_PHONE_NUMBER_IS_NOT_VALID: Shipping phone number is not valid.
THERE_ARE_NO_ITEMS_IN_YOUR_ORDER: There are no items in your order.
CART_MISMATCH: Cart mismatch. The cart sent by the client does not match the session cart.
UNABLE_TO_UPDATE_ORDER: Unable to update order after failed attempt..
UNABLE_TO_LOAD_DATA_FOR_CHECKOUT: Unable to load data for checkout.
UNABLE_TO_RE_SUBMIT_ORDER_FOR_CHECKOUT: Unable to re-submit order for checkout
Unexpected token R in JSON at position 0: Something went wrong, please try again
CART_EXCEEDS_THE_MAXIMUM_SIZE: Your cart exceeds the maximum size of {{quantity}} products.
CART_MISMATCH_CANT_FIND_PRODUCT: Cart mismatch. Can't find product in submitted cart: {{title}}.
PRICE_MISMATCH: Price mismatch. Price submitted does not match our price for {{title}}
QUANTITY_SUBMITTED_NOT_MATCH_IN_THE_CART: Quantity submitted does not match the quantity in the cart for {{title}}
THE_SALE_FOR_TITLE_HAS_ENDED: The sale for {{title}} has ended! It has been removed from your cart.
TITLE_IS_OUT_OF_STOCK: {{title}} is out of stock. It has been removed from your cart.
COULD_NOT_LOCATE_TITLE_IN_OUR_SYSTEM: Could not locate {{title}} in our system. It has been removed from your cart.
ONLY_LIMITED_UNITS_IN_STOCK: There are only {{quantity}} units of {{title}} in stock. We have adjusted your cart.
MIXED_INT_DESC: Your cart contains {{qty}} international products, so your order must be paid by credit card. If you'd like to pay by cash on delivery please remove those products from your cart and try again.
INT_DESC: Your cart contains international products, so your order must be paid by credit card.
